dct_title_s: Electric Power Substations: United States, Spring 2013
dct_description_sm: This point shapefile provides the location, current and previous owners, maximum kilovolts of power, operational status, and other infomation for electric power substations in the United States. Data are updated to 2015. This layer is a part of a collection of GIS data containing renewable and electric energy information for the U.S., including data on transmission lines, power plants and electricity substations.
This layer can be used for locating electric power substations within the United States.
This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
dct_rights_sm: These data are licensed by Stanford Libraries and are available to Stanford University affiliates only. Affiliates are limited to current faculty, staff and students. Non affiliates seeking access should contact the publisher directly. These data may not be reproduced or used for any purpose without permission.
